speaker: Last Toast
lines: The stein is heavier than it looks.
Frost rims the lip; the handle is warm.
You lift it. The room goes quiet.
You drink and feel clear and steady.
The cat meows by the hearth.
You set the mug back where it was.

give_item.name: Last Toast
give_item.description: Raise and renew: a benediction that steadies the hand
